Max De Somma is a senior Engineering major at Harvey Mudd College in Claremont, California. He grew up in 
the Bay Area about 30 minutes north of San Francisco. His academic interestists include a mixture of electrical design as 
well as mechanical properties. He works in the student machine shop on campus where he helps students and 
faculty in learning how to safely operate heavy machinery. When he is not doing home work or in the shop Max 
likes riding bikes, swimming, and playing board games.
